con:soapui-project.name: Test Demo REST Jersey with Spring

con:method.name: POST new podcast with form url encoded data

con:assertion.name: Valid HTTP Status Codes - 204 No Content

con:restRequest.name: POST new podcast without feed - 400 (BAD_REQUEST)

con:assertion.name: Valid HTTP Status Codes - 400 Bad Request

con:configuration.token: Please verify that the feed is properly generated/set

con:restRequest.name: POST new podcast without title - 400 (BAD_REQUEST)

con:assertion.name: Valid HTTP Status Codes - 400 Bad Request

con:configuration.token: Please verify that the title is properly generated/set

con:restRequest.name: POST new podcast correctly - 201 (CREATED)

con:configuration.scriptText: //// check for the location header assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"] != "http://localhost:8888/demo-rest-jersey-spring/podcasts/1"

con:testStep.name: POST same podcast as before to receive - 409 (CONFLICT)

con:restRequest.name: POST same podcast as before to receive - 409 (CONFLICT)
PUT new podcast at location - 201 (CREATED)
con:restRequest.con:request: { "id":2, "title":"Quarks & Co - zum Mitnehmen", "linkOnPodcastpedia":"http://www.podcastpedia.org/quarks", "feed":"http://podcast.wdr.de/quarks.xml", "description":"Quarks & Co: Das Wissenschaftsmagazin" }

con:configuration.scriptText: // check for the amazon id header assert messageExchange.responseHeaders["Location"] != "http://localhost:8888/demo-rest-jersey-spring/podcasts/2"

con:testStep.name: GET podcasts sorted by insertion date DESC - 200 (OK)

con:restRequest.name: GET podcasts sorted by insertion date DESC - 200 (OK)

con:testStep.name: PUT not "complete" podcast for FULL update - 400 (BAD_REQUEST)

con:restRequest.name: PUT not "complete" podcast for FULL update - 400 (BAD_REQUEST)
PUT podcast for FULL update - 200 (OK)
con:restRequest.con:request: { "id":2, "title":"Quarks & Co - zum Mitnehmen", "linkOnPodcastpedia":"http://www.podcastpedia.org/quarks", "feed":"http://podcast.wdr.de/quarks.xml", "description":"Quarks & Co: Das Wissenschaftsmagazin" }

con:testStep.name: POST (partial update) for not existent podcast - 404 (NOT_FOUND)

con:restRequest.name: POST (partial update) for not existent podcast - 404 (NOT_FOUND)

con:testStep.name: add podcast from application form urlencoded

con:restRequest.name: add podcast from application form urlencoded
